name: Shougi Touryuumon
overview: A basic shogi (Japanese chess) game that can be used as an introduction to shogi. The game has a variety of game modes, such as authentic 'Honshogi', 'Winner-take-all' for testing your skills, and 'Tsutsumi-Shogi', which can be played in a short intervals. The 'Research Mode' allows players to select from various patterns of fighting from the beginning, such as 'stick Gin' and '4-segment skipping car', making this game ideal for beginners to improve their skills. Also, considering the fact that the game is designed for a portable console, it is possible to save a game record for each move, so that you can stop the game at any time.
